channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024031303
item.description:
Report X-2024031303

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: DUPONT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was placed into a bin in unload, Brought over to QA for inspection. Box was visibly wet, Upon inspection the containers of degreaser had loose caps causing them to leak out. DescribePack: Seals/Caps were loose causing the liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened, Spills were wiped up.

item.title: Report X-2024031112
item.description:
Report X-2024031112

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found leaking and upside down was placed in a red hazmat tote and brought to QA repack DescribePack: the bottom of the box was wet and ripped out 2 of the bottles were loose and leaked inside the box do to being upside down DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: it was placed in a red lined hazmat tote
